did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Letter Book of Marcus A. Smith, 1900-1905
did.abstract: Marcus A. Smith, 1951-1924 was a Politician and U.S. Senator from Arizona, 1912-1921. This collection includes a letter book; personal correspondence chiefly concerning mining investments and replies to requests for assistance.
